mapper.sql: a_id, a_type, a_even, a_leave_time, a_create_time, a_state, u_id
mapper.insert: insert into apply (a_id, a_type, a_even, a_leave_time, a_create_time, a_state, u_id) values (#{aId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{aType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{aEven,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{aLeaveTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{aCreateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{aState,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{uId,jdbcType=INTEGER})

insert into apply
a_id,
a_type,
a_even,
a_leave_time,
a_create_time,
a_state,
u_id,
#{aId,jdbcType=INTEGER},

mapper.update:
update apply
a_type = #{aType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
a_even = #{aEven,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
a_leave_time = #{aLeaveTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
a_create_time = #{aCreateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
a_state = #{aState,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
u_id = #{uId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where a_id = #{aId,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update apply set a_type = #{aType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, a_even = #{aEven,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, a_leave_time = #{aLeaveTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, a_create_time = #{aCreateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, a_state = #{aState,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, u_id = #{uId,jdbcType=INTEGER} where a_id = #{aId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
